2.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> I'm very pleased to congratulate 
 all the finalists </font>

5.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> and to announce that the 2015 
 Telstra Australia Business Women's </font>

11.text:
<font color="#FFFF00"> For Purpose and Social Enterprise 
 Award winner </font>

19.text:
<font color="#00FF00"> SONG: ♪ A fighter, 
 dancing through the fire </font>

25.text: <font color="#00FF00"> ♪ And you're gonna hear me roar </font>

29.text: <font color="#00FF00"> ♪ Louder, louder than a lion </font>

37.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> This is the most incredible honour. </font>

44.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> Looking out on this beautiful room, 
 in the halo of pink, </font>

48.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> it's an absolute joy for many 
 reasons to be standing here. </font>

53.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> I want to thank Telstra, </font>

55.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I want to thank the 
 Commonwealth Bank and News Corp </font>

58.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> because you've enabled 
 this wonderful celebration </font>

61.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> of talent, passion and excellence </font>

65.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to shine from some 
 truly incredible women. </font>

69.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Over the last couple of days, </font>

71.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> it's been an absolute joy to be here
 in Melbourne with these finalists. </font>

76.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> A joy to meet so many women who are 
 not only leaders in their fields, </font>

81.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> but are passionate 
 in creating a community </font>

84.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> that is inclusive and caring. </font>

88.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It's been an honour to have been 
 in your company. Thank you. </font>

97.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> To be awarded the For Purpose 
 and Social Enterprise Award </font>

100.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> is so humbling, 
 and I'm proud and privileged </font>

104.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to represent South Australia 
 on this national stage. </font>

110.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I'm proud to be given the honour 
 to represent the non-profit sector. </font>

115.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> As I said in my speech 
 in my home state, </font>

118.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> the non-profit sector has been 
 in the shadows for too long. </font>

125.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I would like 
 to particularly thank Telstra </font>

128.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> for the importance 
 of acknowledging this sector </font>

131.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> by actually having this category. </font>

133.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And I'd also like to reflect 
 on the awards process. </font>

137.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> It has been a journey </font>

139.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> that I wasn't always confident 
 that I should be on. </font>

143.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I didn't necessarily think 
 I could stand tall </font>

146.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> alongside some incredible 
 past winners. </font>

152.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> But I grew during the experience, 
 and I am grateful to my family, </font>

156.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to my friends, 
 to mentors and work colleagues </font>

160.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and others who have believed in me 
 and encouraged me to do better, </font>

164.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> even when it would have been easy </font>

166.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to put those pages and pages 
 of that application aside. </font>

170.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And I still remember 
 there were 23 of them. </font>

175.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I am passionate about guide-dogs 
 and the non-profit sector. </font>

178.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It is why I go to work every day, 
 it is my inspiration. </font>

183.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> A smile touched me the other day. </font>

186.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It was a simple photo of a family 
 going to the Royal Adelaide Show, </font>

190.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> but their smiles showed 
 that they were having fun. </font>

193.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> And you might say, "So what? </font>

195.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> "Lots of people go to the show 
 and have fun." </font>

198.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> But it was the first time 
 in many, many years </font>

201.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> that this family had actually 
 been able to go to the show. </font>

205.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> They have a son with autism. </font>

207.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> When his senses become overwhelmed </font>

210.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> by the lights, by the noise, 
 by the stress, </font>

214.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> he copes in the only way 
 he knows how - </font>

219.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And he can bolt, 
 sometimes into danger. </font>

224.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> So often these families 
 become trapped. </font>

226.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> It's too stressful to go out 
 to playgrounds, to cafes, </font>

230.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> so they just stay at home. </font>

232.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> But by the calming influence </font>

233.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> of this family's new 
 autism-assistance dog, Griffin, </font>

236.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> the family 
 was able to go to the show, </font>

239.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and hence the smiles meant so much 
 to me to see in that photograph. </font>

244.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> And one other little quick story. </font>

246.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> One of our clients, 
 with her guide-dog, York, </font>

249.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> went on a camping trip 
 to central Australia. </font>

252.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> She told us she walked along 
 Kings Canyon and it was beautiful. </font>

257.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> "How did you know?" we asked. </font>

259.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> With her guide-dog 
 and someone to lead her, </font>

261.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> she felt the breeze on her face, 
 she heard the sounds of the birds </font>

267.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and touched the rough surface 
 of the rocks with her hands. </font>

271.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And her companion described 
 the colours around her </font>

274.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> and she imagined the view. </font>

279.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> That's why I'm so passionate 
 about my sector. </font>

282.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> We try and make a difference to 
 those people living with disability </font>

285.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> by enriching their lives and helping
 them to reach their full potential. </font>

290.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> I would like to honour 
 my fellow finalists </font>

293.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> for having the passion 
 and the commitment </font>

295.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> to reaching out in your own states </font>

297.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to create caring, inclusive 
 communities in the work that you do.</font>

305.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And from the women I have met today,
 I know that we have enough passion, </font>

310.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> perhaps grunt, to make 
 positive things happen. </font>

313.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> We'll still need to be bold - </font>

315.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> it is a difficult time in our sector</font>

316.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> with the National Disability Sector 
 coming in </font>

319.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and changing the way 
 that we do things - </font>

321.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> and philanthropy 
 will continue to be vital. </font>

324.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Did you know every hour, every day, </font>

327.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> an Australian learns 
 that they will lose their sight. </font>

330.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Of these, nine will become blind. </font>

334.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And that's a lot of people 
 who need our help </font>

336.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> to make sure that no-one 
 is left in the dark. </font>

340.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> And I would just like to finish with
 a very brief quote from Lin Yutang. </font>

345.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> "Hope is like a road in the country.</font>

349.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> "There was never a road, 
 but when many people walk on it, </font>

353.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> "the road becomes clear 
 and it comes into existence." </font>

359.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> Thank you so much for this honour. </font>
